𓊪 pool : Letter 'P' in the Alphabet

𓊪 pu 𒇥 PÚ bù PÙ pool "source" < por ⇔ pond (pu.ant secondary?)

𓊪 ≈ պ ⰱ in hieratic! ⇔ 𐎜 𓇏 𓇐 bog 𓆷 ?

𓊪 p Π П ⨅ pe pi > 𐩨 beth 𐤁 በ ב ﺏ ܒ π 𓉐 @ Sabaean … 𓊪 p > 𑀩 ba vs 𓉐 π 𑀪 bh @ Brahmi 𓊪 pa > 𜎼 va ( in father … ) @ Elamite 𓊪 pe > 𐩰 fe vs 𐤐 ፈ פ ف ܦ 𓊪 @ Sabaean 𓊪 p > 𑀩 box 𐎜 ᵝủᵡ in hieratic and Ugaritic

𓊪 p > b vs 𓉐 pr π 𑀪 bh vs 𓃀 pod bein fuss

𓊪 ≈ 𓎺 𓎻 𓐐 𓊸 "b" bowl bucket 𓃜 bock ( Champollion ) 𓊪 ≈ 𓈟 Brunn 𓊪 ≈ 𓐦 pair 𓊪 ≈ ph ≈ 𓇦 flax 𓊪 ≈ 𓎺 󳽛 󳽜 󳽝 𓇦 b Champollion 𓊪 ≈ 󳽟 󳽠 󳽡 𓊪 ≈ 𓏊 pot 𓊪 𓅮 𓊃 𓏋 <> water

𓊪 ≈ podest **

𓊪 ≈ 𔕷 𔕹 pa 𔖎 𔕯 𓏊 𜎯 ba pa bowl pot

𓊪 ≈ 𒁀 box pack bag 𓎤

𓊪 ⋍ ⰱ Letter B in Hieratic and Old Church Slavonic (Glagolitic) (Buky:Buchstabe)

𓊪 ⋍ պ = p in Armenian! ⇔ 𓆷 𐀷 Պ •pos < posten / port

𓁶 𓊪 𓏏 proto bereshid first!

𓊪 pho ⇔ qva 口 𒆸

peculiar shound shift 𓊪 pho ⇔ qva 口 𒆸 (𓊪𓏲 who-qua-ki)

frequent in reflexive pronoun 𓊪𓏲 ⋍ 'who' 'one' 'whom' pro… person … qui, que

resolution via bipartite alphabetic entry 𓊪 > 𑀩 box 𐎜 ᵝủᵡ bu.q :

article π
